snippet: Japan temporarily recalled its ambassador to China on Sunday in response to renewed friction over a disputed island group, at a time when it faces discord over sex slaves from World War II.
abstract: Japan temporarily recalls its ambassador to China in response to renewed friction over a disputed island group, while it faces discord with allies South Korea and the United States over women forced to work in Japanese brothels during World War II; diplomatic flare-ups, while minor, underscore how disagreements over history and territory continue to isolate Japan from the rest of Asia.
lead_paragraph: Japan temporarily recalled its ambassador to China on Sunday in response to renewed friction over a disputed island group, at a time when it faces discord over sex slaves from World War II.

headline.seo: Japan Recalls Ambassador in Island Dispute With China
headline.main: Under Diplomatic Strain, Japan Recalls Envoy in Dispute With China Over Islands
headline.print_headline: Under Diplomatic Strain, Japan Recalls Envoy in Dispute With China Over Islands
